item.description:
Come join us for an easy walk through fields and woods, where the dogs can run free and no one bothers us! There are many trails I have yet to explore and a dirt road that will lead us past a beaver pond to a working damn. A lovely walk but a bit buggy so bring along some bug spray!

Directions:From Rt.8N take exit 45 (Kennedy Drive). Take a left off the exit.Left at the end of Kennedy Drive onto Winstead Rd. Follow to Junction with Main street and Newfield rd..Take a right onto Newfield road. Continue straight to park entrance about 2-3 miles on the left. VERY easy to over look the sign!!!

Two legged friends are also welcome to join us!!! :)
